name: Rover Adventure
description:
Game tells story of rover exploring the unknown planet.

CONTROL:

Move/rotate : arrows keys;

To research a object: SPACEBAR;

Acceleration: SHIFT

RULES:
1)    The dark cloud and earthquake damaged for you
2)    To investigate each objects: to approach closer and to press SPACEBAR
3)    The energy is spent for movement
4)    when energy isn't enough, rover is switched off
5)    Clouds prevent regeneration of solar energy of rover

VICTORY CONDITION:
research points are gathered

DESIGN MADE BY

Angelina Bukharova
